averycowan.checkers

Class Checker

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • averycowan.checkers.Checker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    King

    public class Checker
extends Actor
    This class defines the properties of a checker piece.

      • doMove

        public boolean doMove(Location l,
                      boolean jumpPossible,
                      boolean real)
        checks if a move is possible and if so does it
        Parameters:
        l - the designated location to move to
        jumpPossible - if a jump is possible on the board by any piece of the same color
        real - if it should create a tracker on the world
        Returns:
        if the piece can move the specified location

                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> dirs,
                 Location l,
                 boolean real)
        Moves itself
        Parameters:
        jump - if the desired move is a jump
        dirs - the list of directions indicating a move of jump sequence leading to the destination
        l - the destination
        real - if it should create a tracker on the world
